name: SuperTrucks Offroad
description: SuperTrucks Offroad is a top-down racer inspired by the arcade/NES classic 'Ironman Super Offroad' bringing you offroad arcade racing action that is easy to pick up, but hard to master!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Celeron Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia or ATI DirectX9 Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel I3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia or ATI DirectX11 Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space
